title: Dear Smurfs,
body:
You guys are so great at LOL.  How I wish I could be you.
The way you farm and the way you roam. How I wish I could be you.
The rage in chat with no words to help. How I wish I could be you.
Every time you die and blame your team, it just doesn't seem fair to you. How I wish I could be you.
Don't forget those team fights you start, 5v1, because you could't wait and you die. You guessed it, I wish I could be you.
Name calling, surrendering, and the "/all MY TEAM SUCKS" it must be great to be you.

Really, as a noob, but also as someone who is trying to get better.  I would much rather you say things like
"Hey, their team is AP, build some MR."  No shit someone did that for me the other day and I learned something.
I go on Mobafire to look at builds, I do custom games to try to get better at JG and last hitting.
But there is so many little things smurfs could help us with instead of complaining all the time.

Lets be honest, making a smurf account you know you will be stuck with new players.  And if you fall into the category
of the first "poem" why even bother.  I have fun playing LOL, but lately I have been playing ARAM,
just to stay away from the smurfs who do think they are Gods gift to LOL.

Also to the noobs.  Let them know you are new and take any good advice they give you.
Don't let a few of the way some behave stop you from having fun.  Get better at what you like doing
and be a rounded player as much as possible.  Don't just go mid or ADC.  Learn all the roles. And for the love of Pete
learn how to ward. (I suck at warding still)

GG/HF
A noob

I once asked a "Diamond 1 smurf" if they had any advice for me. They told me "Uninstall and hang yourself".
Yep.
I played with one who told me the reason they are toxic was because they got perma-banned. No, this was not a grammatical mistake. I was just sitting there like "Did Urgot ult your logic or...?"

Define smurf.... Is it anyone who is on a second account? Or does your main account need to be  level 30? Do you have to be a certain rank? I.e. bronze,silver,gold,plat, etc.? People always throw the word "smurf" around but it really has a vague meaning. All you know when someone says their a smurf is that they most likely have another account.  What level is their main account? Who knows.... how good are they really? who knows... 

I have played this game for years and remember back in season 2 when I was super bad I thought "lol I am smurfing" when I was on a second account playing new players. Then I realized that's retarded to do and all that means is you are really bad at the game. I now have another account that I originally had in bronze to "smurf" which is now in silver 3. Does this count as smurfing? Either way.. I am still bad at this game.

What I am trying to say is:
1. If you are level 30 don't make a second account soley to beat on new players. You are a retard and clearly suck at the game.
2. If you are an actual diamond or plat or w/e player playing at a lower elo... dont say shit in ranked because no one cares.
3. Stop hating on "smurfs" because most of us who have played this game for years have more than one account for various reasons. Just focus on your game and getting better.
4. People are going to continue to make more accounts and Riot is never going to do shit about it. So stop bringing it up.

first, chill on the r slur okay? second, i don't think OP is hating on all smurfs and i'm pretty sure the widely accepted definition of smurf is someone of a higher skill level playing against people of lower levels, and therefore lower skill levels, on a lower level/skill level account. for example, robertxlee is in challenger but he has many smurfs in diamond. yeah the post sounds like a generalization, but i've met a hella lot of smurfs that are like how the OP described so i'm not surprised seeing this. we have a problem with toxic players and smurfs are easily apart of them.

Post like OPs happen a few times a week. I get that its a problem but its been a problem for years. Riot has literally done nothing about it and I cannot see them doing anything anytime soon. Why should they? People making second accounts generally  = money for Riot. Even if they somehow (how the f would they ever not allow smurfs??) many players already have multiple accounts.

first off, op doesn't think smurfs are bad in general just smurfs that are assholes (and there are a lot of them). smurfing helps both players and riot. second off, riot has actually been doing a lot and i think their system of reporting is actually pretty effective (compared to other systems of banning i've seen) because they obviously cant screen everyone before they make an account.

Don't we all. It does seem like Riot's improved reporting system has resulted in increased punishment. This should help players one day realize being a toxic asshole will get you banned. I think new players are going to always have a tough time in this game because of how many new accounts are being made. It seems like with the increased punishments, more players are making new accounts since their main account is banned or has a large chat or game restriction. Hopefully it weeds itself out, but I can't see the new player experience being better anytime soon. 

I do agree with the OP that it would be nice for experienced players to help out new players instead of telling them they suck. Maybe one day that point will come across.
